h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: The interior tunnel will end with a sealed cell gate, as well as a Starved Abomination that will try to ambush you from a corner. Let the creature tire itself out swinging wildly with its sickle before taking it down with just a few hits.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 1)'.
The content is as follows:
The interior tunnel will end with a sealed cell gate, as well as a Starved Abomination that will try to ambush you from a corner. Let the creature tire itself out swinging wildly with its sickle before taking it down with just a few hits.
